metadata.title: CVE-2023-32439 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in iOS 16.5.1 and iPadOS 16.5.1, Safari 16.5.1, macOS Ventura 13.4.1, iOS 15.7.7 and iPadOS 15.7.7. Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited.

notes.note: jdstrand> webkit receives limited support. For details, see https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SecurityTeam/FAQ#webkit webkit in Ubuntu uses the JavaScriptCore (JSC) engine, not V8

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
